description: Ministry of Water Supply and Drainage - Order to approve the acquisition of the immovable properties in Kurunegala Udawalpola and Gattuwana D/S Division Kurunegala Kurunegala District for the constructions under Greater Kurunegala Water Supply and Sanitation Project and in Mhakanda, D/S Divsiion Kandy and Gangawata Korale Kandy District for the construction under Kandy South Water Supply Project
